## getPropByPath() function

根据 object对象的path路径获取值。 Gets the property value at path of `object`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getPropByPath<Target = any, ExpectValue = any, DeepTarget = Target>(obj: Target, path: string, strict?: boolean): IGetPathResult<ExpectValue, DeepTarget>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | <code>Target</code> | 要检索的<code>对象</code>。 The <code>object</code> to query. |
|  path | <code>string</code> | 要获取属性的<code>路径</code>。 The <code>path</code> of the property to get. |
|  strict | <code>boolean</code> | 是否严格模式，obj解析出错时弹出错误 |

<b>Returns:</b>

`IGetPathResult<ExpectValue, DeepTarget>`

- 返回解析结果。 Returns the resolved value.

## Remarks


## Example


```ts
const object = { 'a': [{ 'b': { 'c': 3 } }] };
getPropByPath(object, 'a[0].b.c');
// => 3
getPropByPath(object, 'a.b.d');
// => throw Error("please transfer a valid prop path to form item!")

```
